text:
was a Japanese actor and singer. He made his acting debut in 1997. He became well known in the mid-2000s starring in "Gokusen 3" and the 2007 movie "Koizora". He also starred as Eren Jaeger in the 2015 movie "Attack on Titan". Miura was born in Tsuchiura, Japan.
Miura was found dead at his home in Tokyo on July 18, 2020 at the age of 30. The cause of death was suicide by hanging.
